author.name: Conchobar mac Dubhthach
author.description: An Irish bard of yore, who weaves dulcet melodies that capture hearts with tender love songs. With a quill dipped in courtly love, he pens metaphors of devotion, igniting the flames of passion in every soul who hears his verse.

newsMedieval:
In distant Malaysia's verdant land, the bard of tales doth sing,
Of TikTok's dance with law's command, a puppet on a string.
'Tis not enough to play in tune, the minister critic,
Defame and deceive, under the moon, needs further hieroglyphic.

The jingle of the sterling fair, in Kingdoms old and grand,
Shakes not the market's deep despair, in line with demand.
The bear and bull in courtyards play, in high stance they endure,
No silver song to sway the day, no certainty secure.

From Gaza's strife, a tale unwinds, of Hamas, fierce and bold,
Their purpose hidden in their minds, in hushed whispers, told.
They rush from shadows, sphere of throes, unrest and turmoil reel,
In braided verse and brooding prose, their sonnet of ordeal.

feedItems.title: Malaysia Says TikTok Not in Full Compliance With Its Laws
feedItems.description: China-owned social-media platform TikTok isn’t in full compliance with Malaysian laws and needs to do more to curb the spread of defamatory and misleading content in the country, a Malaysian minister said.

feedItems.title: Sterling Little Moved After UK GDP Data
feedItems.description: Sterling was little changed after the latest GDP data was in line with consensus, with Monex Europe saying the reading “is unlikely to encourage a change of stance from the BOE, with policymakers having recently paused their hiking cycle signalling a high-for-longer stance.”

feedItems.title: What Is Hamas? What to Know About the Militant Group Fighting Israel
feedItems.description: Hamas upended the stability of the entire Middle East when its fighters surged into Israel from the Gaza Strip. What exactly are its objectives?

author.name: Æthelred the Skald
author.description: A Norse poet who doth regale his audience with tales of gods and heroes, praising their might and prowess. He references Norse mythology and history in his poems. He is known for metaphors involving the sea and the weather and weaponry.

newsMedieval:
Hear ye now, of EasyJet's plight,
A Viking vessel in tempestuous night.
Predicted yield falls short of mark,
Yet spark of hope flickers in the dark.
As fourth-quarter harvests do arise,
They pledge to honour dividend ties.

Next, the tale of Seven & i,
Its treasure scant 'neath foreign sky.
7-Eleven stores in alien lands,
Hold less than promised golden sands.
And department store, now ceded ground,
Furthers the net worth’s downward bound.

To the land of the Teutons, our saga moves,
Where Bunds hold strong as Odin approves.
Though inflation mounts in lands far west,
And the oil-flame weakens at its best,
In the face of risks that yield dismay,
They, like the sturdy ash, do stay.

feedItems.title: EasyJet Warns of Profit Miss
feedItems.description: EasyJet said it expected to report a headline pretax profit for fiscal 2023 of £440-460 million, missing consensus, but said it would reinstate dividends after fourth-quarter profit rose.

feedItems.title: 7-Eleven Owner's First-Half Profit Falls on Weak Overseas Business
feedItems.description: Seven & i Holdings said its first-half net profit fell due to weakness in its 7-Eleven convenience stores overseas and losses related to the sale of its department-store business.

feedItems.title: German Bunds Remain Supported Amid Geopolitical Risks
feedItems.description: While U.S. CPI data should underscore that inflation is still noticeably above target, weaker oil, flows and geopolitical risks keep Bunds supported, Commerzbank Research said.

author.name: Brother Arnulfus
author.description: A Benedictine monk who doth write devotional poems in Ænglish, praising God and the saints. His poems are often humorous, short, and satirical. They often contain metaphors of alcohol, especially wine or ale.

newsMedieval:
Ye Uniqlo shops leap up so high,
With profits reaching to the sky.
Bless'd be their worldly fabric tail,
In their sales, they never fail.

In realm of UK, growth's observed,
Economy by service served.
Favour turned by His hand to glean,
A modest growth, at point two glean.

Alas, Givaudan's sales do wane,
Their balance hath suffered strain.
But fear not, for they've a plan,
Price increases 'cross all the land.

feedItems.title: Uniqlo Owner's Profit Rises to Record High
feedItems.description: Fast Retailing said fiscal-year net profit climbed to a record high thanks to stronger sales at its Uniqlo outlets globally.

feedItems.title: U.K. Economy Returns to Growth as Expected
feedItems.description: The U.K.’s GDP rose 0.2% in August, in line with forecasts, driven by output in the services sector.

feedItems.title: Givaudan Ups Prices Further as Sales Pressured
feedItems.description: Givaudan reported a decline in sales to CHF1.7 billion in the third quarter, and said it continued to implement price increases to offset higher costs.

author.name: Guillemette de Ventadour
author.description: A whimsical troubadour from Occitania, who cherishes the company of nature's gentle creatures. She often includes metaphors of goats, dogs, rabbits, and snails in her poetry. Her writing style is terse.

newsMedieval:
In Publicis we find a goat, robust the yield, a hopeful note,
On backdrop rough, it sparing trots, gains made in market's savage lots.

Next springs the hare, the Nikkei's flight,
At dawn it stirs, gains in its sight,
With Fed's pause nigh, it leaps with delight,
Closing the day at a lofty height.

At last the snail, the acting kin,
In silence held where talks begin,
Hopes of work are thin and sparse,
In Hollywood, under starry guise.

feedItems.title: Publicis Upgrades Outlook as Sales Top Hopes
feedItems.description: Publicis raised its guidance for the second time this year after third-quarter organic revenue growth beat expectations, saying market-share gains allowed it to offset a challenging economic backdrop.

feedItems.title: Nikkei Rises 1.75% on Rising Prospects for a Fed Pause
feedItems.description: Japan’s Nikkei Stock Average rose 1.75% to close at 32494.66 on rising prospects for a Fed pause.

feedItems.title: Hollywood Studios Suspend Talks With Actors
feedItems.description: The breakdown of negotiations after less than two weeks dampens hopes that the industry could soon return to work.
